Disease.Name: DUCHENNE MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY
Disease.Synonym: MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY, PSEUDOHYPERTROPHIC PROGRESSIVE, DUCHENNE AND BECKER TYPES; MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY, CHILDHOOD PSEUDOHYPER

Protein.Number: Dystrophin, Latent-transforming growth factor beta-binding protein 4

Disease.Summary: rare (1:3000);X-linked recessive ;mutation in the gene encoding dystrophin
